revised_title: Annual Meeting and Election of Fellows in 1897
tldr: The annual meeting for the election of fellows at the Royal Society took place on June 3, 1897. Several candidates were elected into the society, and various papers were presented, including one on the sensitiveness of the retina to light and color. The society expressed gratitude to the scrutators and acknowledged the presents received.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Scientific community
